description: On their final day as the 67th Student Council at Shuchiin Academy, the four members clean out the Student Council Room where they find many memorable items, one after the other. From the banner used at the French exchange student welcome party, the deck of cards that was used to cheat during Concentration, the cards from the forbidden word game, the cosplay cat ears, the inappropriate magazine that was confiscated from a student, and the movie tickets for Mr. Birdson of Birdville, each of these items bring back fond memories and they can’t stop talking about their time together. And so, the four leave the empty Student Council Room behind...

titles.title: Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Gaze at the Moon / The 67th Student Council / Kaguya Doesn`t Want to Say It
Shirogane Miyuki veut contempler / Le 67e Bureau des Élèves / Kaguya ne veut pas appeler
Shirogane Miyuki wa Miagetai / Dai 67 Ki Seitokai / Kaguya-sama wa Yobitakunai
شيروغاني ميوكي يريد مشاهدة القمر / مجلس الطلبة السابع والستون / كاغويا لا تريد نطقه
白銀御行は見上げたい / 第67期生徒会 / かぐや様は呼びたくない
